messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to The Unholy Titan. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in The Unholy Titan's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
